remarks: If ` D ` is a closed set in the topology of the complex numbers (stated here in basic form), and all the elements of the sequence lie in ` D ` , then the limit of the sequence also lies in ` D ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)

rlimcld2.5 $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ y e. ( CC \ D ) ) /\ z e. D ) -> R <_ ( abs ` ( z - y ) ) ) $.
rlimcld2.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. D ) $.
